description:
Description :
While running to eat, I fell down the stairs.

Obviously it was

I ended up being the infamous wizard in the TL novels. I feel sad just possessing a villain, but I'm impatient because men can't leave me alone. I never wished for anything like this!

"If you loved me, didn't you ask me to be tied up?" "Males don't get along with one woman." "I hope I'm your only one."

For some reason, the more I avoid them, the more they cling to me. "Honey, so it's me? Is it him?"

I hate everything! go away! go away!
